attributes.action: Make Period and Hygiene products free for all
attributes.additional_details: Making period products free would reduce inequality, improve public health, support education and employment, and treat menstruation as the normal, unavoidable part of life that it is — not a financial burden.
attributes.background: The government can make free period products a reality by passing a national law, funding distribution, working with schools and local councils, raising awareness, and ensuring products are safe, sustainable, and widely available.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund free period pads
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733282
